citation.article-title: Agromonas oligotrophica gen. nov., sp. nov., a nitrogen-fixing oligotrophic bacterium.

p.s: Agromonas is described as follows: Bent, branched and budding cells. Motile by polar flagella. No resting stages known. Gram-negative. Colonies colourless. Aerobic. Catalase-positive. Oxidase-positive. Not proteolytic to casein and gelatin. Cellulose and starch not hydrolysed. Atmospheric nitrogen is fixed under low O2-pressure. Cellular fatty acids mainly consist of a straight-chain unsaturated acid C18:1. Ubiquinone Q-10 is present. The GC content of the DNA ranges from 65.1-66.0 mol%. Type species is Agromonas oligotrophica sp. nov.
